overview.en: GTA relies on block-chain technology and unique economic models to build a technology business ecology closed loop, incentivize large-scale group collaboration with a block-chain incentive mechanism to gather massive amounts of whole-genome phenotype data quickly; aiming to use genome phenotype data storage and application drive the development of the world’s genetic technology and contribute to the health and well-being of all human beings. At the same time, the wide application of whole-genome phenotype data in the field of life and health realize the commercial value.
overview.zh: GTA依托区块链技术和经济模型构建了基因科技商业生态闭环；以区块链激励机制激发大规模群体协作，从而快速聚集海量的全基因组表型大数据；旨在以全基因组表型大数据存储及应用驱动世界基因科技发展，为全人类健康福祉做出贡献；同时，以全基因组表型大数据在生命健康领域的广泛应用实现巨大的商业价值。
